class.name: PhysicsRayIntersectionResult3D
class.brief_description: Stores the result of a ray intersection query.
class.description: This object contains the intersection information produced by [method PhysicsDirectSpaceState3D.intersect_ray]. After calling [method PhysicsDirectSpaceState3D.intersect_ray], the fields of this object will be populated with the hit information if the ray intersects a shape. If no intersection occurred, the values remain unchanged from the previous state.

members.member: The face index at the intersection point. This value is only valid if the intersected shape is a [ConcavePolygonShape3D]. Otherwise, [code]-1[/code] is returned.
The unique ID of the intersected object.
The shape index of the intersected object's shape.

The surface normal at the intersection point. If the ray starts inside a shape and [member PhysicsRayQueryParameters3D.hit_from_inside] is [code]true[/code], this value may be [code]Vector3(0, 0, 0)[/code].
